question: During which session of congress Chittaranjan Das was elected its President but Hakim Ajmal Khan presided over the session because he was arrested well before the session started?
explanation: During Ahmedabad Session of INC (1921) , Chittaranjan Das was elected its President but Hakim Ajmal Khan presided over the session because C. R. Das was arrested well before the session started for supporting the non- cooperation movement.
